# samsungcloudplatformv2_iam_role (Data Source)

Show Role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "samsungcloudplatformv2" {
}

data "samsungcloudplatformv2_iam_role" "role" {
  id = var.id
}


output "role" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatformv2_iam_role.role
}


variable "id" {
  type    = string
  default = ""
}
```
